parameters.name: DocumentType
parameters.description: Document type as defined in swDocumentTypes_e

title: ICommandManager.GetCommandTabCount
description: Gets the number of tabs on the CommandManager for the specified document type.

parameters.name: DocumentType
parameters.description: Document type as defined in swDocumentTypes_e

returns: Number of tabs on the CommandManager
remarks:
Call this method before
ICommandManager::IGetCommandTabs
to get the size of the array for that method.
All CommandManager tabs are returned. Some CommandManager tabs may not be active or visible.
